extracted_information: Meta AI has shown initial signs of self-improvement, leading Mark Zuckerberg to announce tighter release controls for their most powerful AI systems. Zuckerberg stated that Meta's AI systems are beginning to improve themselves without human intervention, calling it the 'first step towards achieving artificial superintelligence (ASI)'. While optimistic about ASI's potential, Zuckerberg said Meta will no longer openly release its most powerful AI systems.
